thread.title: Sonya Firoz

author: Sonya Firoz
title: Sonya Firoz
text: after my initial consultation, I came into the office for my first Clear & Brilliant treatment. I was greeted with Victoria who did my treatment, she was very nice, patient and helpful. I applied numbing cream and the treatment wasn't as painful as expected. I went home a little red and took it easy the first day. Today is day 2 and my skin already looks good. Let's see how it goes. Waiting for treatment #2 in about a month...
